description: Represents environmental data for a production unit (e.g., Greenhouse).

contents.name: humidity
contents.description: Humidity level inside the production unit.

contents.name: co2
contents.description: CO2 concentration inside the production unit.

contents.name: oxygen
contents.description: Oxygen level inside the production unit.

contents.name: lightIntensity
contents.description: Light intensity inside the production unit.
